COMMENT_TX: $Gaylord Perry tried to advance on an overthrow at 1B
ej,walkh102,M,venzt901,Fair/foul call Pirates Manager Harry Walker ejected by 1B umpire Tony Venzon arguing that Willie McCovey's double was foul
$Chuck Harrison called for obstruction at 1B when he bumped Hal Lanier outside the baseline

ej,franh101,M,donaa901,Catch/no catch call $Jesus Alou made a shoetop catch but appeared to juggle the ball; 2B umpire Augie Donatelli signaled safe on the catch; Alou threw the ball to Jim Davenport who relayed it to Dick Groat; Groat stepped on 2B for a force and ran to 1B for the third out of the inning; Pete Rose ran the bases and scored after Groat had touched 1B; the Giants left the field; Reds manager Dave Bristol argued with the umpires, who huddled and then brought the Giants back onto the field; the umpires ruled the ball a catch by Alou and a drop as he was trying to throw, thus eliminating the force play at 2B; Giants Manager Herman Franks ejected by 2B umpire Augie Donatelli and then protested the game
ej,franh101,M,engeb901,Called strike 3 $Giants manager Franks ejected by HP umpire Engel for arguing strike 3 to Davenport
